mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Review (user_id, product_id, rating, content) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{rating}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Review WHERE product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY created_date DESC

SELECT r.review_id AS reviewId, r.product_id AS productId, r.user_id AS userId, r.rating AS rating, r.content AS content, r.created_date AS createdDate, p.product_name AS productName FROM Review r JOIN Product p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.created_date DESC
